entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 8:57 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:57 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 8:57 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
